name: 王世榮
objective:
家具製造程序，課堂透過聽課，專題和分組討論。學習整合與優化其製程。從已設計家具、部件的多元材質，認識所需產出的加工設備，與量產線規劃；減少家具加工，在製程時的浪費。

This is a course in the manufacturing processes of furniture. The course will consist of listening assignments, case studies, class discussion and presentations. In this course, students learn to integrate and optimise the furniture product engineering from handling designed furniture components to be produced of multi-materials used in the furniture manufacturing system based on mass-production equipment & its workflows plan in reducing waste from manufacturing processes.
